software.name: prosody
software.license_label: Standard Open Source Initiative MIT License
software.description: XMPP is an open and free alternative to commercial messaging and chat providers. Set it up for your company, organisation, or just your family and friends. You are in control, and your communication is private to you. Supporting a wide range of client software for desktop and mobile platforms, you can chat using Prosody from any device.
software.about:
Prosody is a modern XMPP communication server. It aims to be easy to set up and configure, and efficient with system resources. Additionally, for developers it aims to be easy to extend and give a flexible system on which to rapidly develop added functionality, or prototype new protocols.

Prosody is open-source software under the permissive MIT/X11 license.
software.custom_start_script:
#!/bin/bash
PID_FILE=/tmp/prosody.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/trap.sh
prosody &
pid=$!
touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
echo $pid >/tmp/prosody.pid
wait

rm /tmp/prosody.pid
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
software.custom_install_script:
cd /tmp/
mkdir prosody-build
cd prosody-build
wget https://prosody.im/downloads/source/prosody-0.9.8.tar.gz
tar xzf prosody-0.9.8.tar.gz
cd prosody-0.9.8
 ./configure --help
 ./configure --ostype=debian
make
make install
cd /
rm -rf /tmp/prosody-build
cd /tmp
 wget http://luarocks.org/releases/luarocks-2.3.0.tar.gz
tar zxpf luarocks-2.3.0.tar.gz
cd luarocks-2.3.0
./configure
 make build 
 make install
rm /tmp/luarocks-2.3.0.tar.gz
rm -r luarocks-2.3.0
luarocks install luasec
 luarocks install luafilesystem
 luarocks install luasocket
luarocks install luaexpat
